about.summary: Cross-platform tool for adding locations to the user PATH, no elevated privileges required!

name: userpath
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "userpath" %}
{% set version = "1.3.0" %}

package:
  name: "{{ name|lower }}"
  version: "{{ version }}"

source:
  url: "https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz"
  sha256: "dd0b8ba650732c614c5e6b709e51be321c596566422d99a443d545401a965468"

build:
  number: 0
  noarch: python
  entry_points:
    - userpath = userpath.cli:userpath
  script: "{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . --no-deps --ignore-installed -vv "

requirements:
  host:
    - pip
    - python
  run:
    - click
    - python

test:
  imports:
    - userpath
  commands:
    - userpath --help

about:
  home: "https://github.com/ofek/userpath"
  license: "MIT"
  license_family: "MIT"
  license_file: "LICENSE-MIT"
  summary: "Cross-platform tool for adding locations to the user PATH, no elevated privileges required!"
  dev_url: "https://github.com/ofek/userpath"

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - mariusvniekerk
